title: Elysion: Futatsu no Rakuen wo Meguru Monogatari
original_name: Elysion 二つの楽園を廻る物語
sinopse: All worldly things have its causes. The strings of fate intertwines with one another, bringing people's lives along to its ups and downs. Elysion: Futatsu no Rakuen wo Meguru Monogatari illustrates the distinct lives of different people who are all inevitably a part of a never ending cycle...
